emuInput.TitMainTitle: Portrait of boy wearing geometric patterned shirt over light colored t-shirt, holding basketball, at South Park for Pittsburgh Courier newsboys picnic
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 10, 1960, pg. A2, reads: "Top Newsboys Win Top Prizes - The smiling faces of Courier newsboy prize-winners were quite evident at the annual picnic last Friday in South Park. These boys received sports equipment, consisting of footballs, basketballs, ping pong and badminton sets, baseballs, bats and gloves."
